Package net.consensys.cava.crypto

Classes and utilities for working with cryptography.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Hash
    Various utilities for providing hashes (digests) of arbitrary data.
    SECP256K1
    An Elliptic Curve Digital Signature using parameters as used by Bitcoin, and defined in Standards for Efficient Cryptography (SEC) (Certicom Research, http://www.secg.org/sec2-v2.pdf).
    SECP256K1.KeyPair
    A SECP256K1 key pair.
    SECP256K1.PublicKey
    A SECP256K1 public key.
    SECP256K1.SecretKey
    A SECP256K1 private key.
    SECP256K1.Signature
    A SECP256K1 digital signature.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidSEC256K1SecretKeyStoreException
    Exception thrown when reading a store that contains an invalid SEC256K1 private keys.
    SECP256K1KeyRecoveryException
    Exception thrown when a key cannot be recovered from a signed data.

Package net.consensys.cava.crypto Description

Classes and utilities for working with cryptography.

These classes are included in the standard Cava distribution, or separately when using the gradle dependency 'net.consensys.cava:cava-crypto' (cava-crypto.jar).
